Name: Name
The instructions are about publishing re: The instructions are about publishing reports related to the scientific conference with international participation "20 years of Bulgaria in NATO and NATO in Bulgaria."
Each participant can participate with up: Each participant can participate with up to two reports at the Scientific Conference – as an author or as a co-author.
Reports are prepared in Word format, and: Reports are prepared in Word format, and each report should be no less than 6 pages and no more than 12 pages, with a recommended length of 20,000 characters including spaces.
Reports will not be accepted after this: Reports will not be accepted after this date.
These guidelines have been developed in: These guidelines have been developed in accordance with the current BDS standard ISO 690:2021 (Guide to bibliographic references and citation of information sources).
The final program of the conference will: The final program of the conference will be provided to the participants upon their registration.
Reports are sent using the attached part: Reports are sent using the attached participation form. Papers that do not follow the submission instructions will not be accepted.
The maximum number of papers that each a: The maximum number of papers that each author can pay (alone or in co-authorship) is two;
The deadline for payment of the papers f: The deadline for payment of the papers for participation in the scientific conference is determined after confirmation of approval for publication of the report, but not later than 22.03.2024;
The fee for participation with one paper: The fee for participation with one paper in the scientific conference for external participants is 50 BGN including VAT. The co-authors of the papers pay a fee in full.
The fee for participation in the scienti: The fee for participation in the scientific conference for learners is 30 BGN including VAT;
The fee for participation without a pape: The fee for participation without a paper in the scientific conference for external participants is 30 BGN including VAT;
The fees are transferred to the bank acc: The fees are transferred to the bank account of the Military Academy "G. S. Rakovski":
Attach your report/article (for authors: Attach your report/article (for authors only, up to 2 MB) in Word
Abstract of the report in Bulgarian lang: Abstract of the report in Bulgarian language,100 to 150 words (mandatory for authors)
Thematic areas you wish to participate i: Thematic areas you wish to participate in
Do you wish to receive a certificate of: Do you wish to receive a certificate of participation in the conference?
